snippet: Lesser versions of the electronic medical record leave many doctors scrambling, as the transition from paper to computer is not always a smooth one.
abstract: Dr Abigail Zuger essay contends that while electronic medical records could one day be extremely effective, their current incarnation leads to diagnostic confusion and frustration.
lead_paragraph: Lesser versions of the electronic medical record leave many doctors scrambling, as the transition from paper to computer is not always a smooth one.

headline.seo: Hypertension or Hammertoe? To the Computer, It’s Just ‘HT’ - The Digital Doctor
headline.main: Which ‘HT’ to Treat: Hypertension or Hammertoe?
headline.print_headline: Which ‘HT’ to Treat: Hypertension or Hammertoe?
